statements.select:
select * from Dicttestitem where 1= 1
Uniqueid = #Uniqueid#
Testcode = #Testcode#
Dicttestitemid != #Dicttestitemid#

select * from Dicttestitem where 1= 1
Uniqueid = #Uniqueid#
Testcode = #Testcode#
Dicttestitemid = #Dicttestitemid#

select g.dicttestitemid , g.testname,g.testtype,g.testcode,nvl(g.forsex,'B') forsex from dictlabandtest a inner join dicttestitem g on a.dicttestitemid=g.dicttestitemid where g.testtype=0 and a.dictlabid=#value# and a.isactive=1 and g.active=1 union all select dtest.dicttestitemid,dtest.testname,dtest.testtype,dtest.testcode,nvl(dtest.forsex,'B') forsex from dicttestgroupdetail d inner join dicttestitem dtest on (d.testgroupid=dtest.dicttestitemid and dtest.testtype=1) inner join dictlabandtest dlab on (dtest.dicttestitemid=dlab.dicttestitemid and dlab.isactive=1 and dlab.dictlabid=#value#) left join dicttestitem g on d.dicttestitemid=g.dicttestitemid where dtest.active=1 group by dtest.dicttestitemid,dtest.testname,dtest.testtype,dtest.testcode,dtest.forsex having count(d.dicttestitemid)=count(g.dicttestitemid) and count(d.dicttestitemid)>0

select * from ( select * from ( select g.* ,rownum as rn from dictlabandtest a inner join dicttestitem g on a.dicttestitemid=g.dicttestitemid where g.testtype <2 and a.dictlabid=#labid# and a.isactive=1 and (g.testname like '%$key$%' or g.fastcode like '%$key$%' or g.engname like '%$key$%') )t where t.rn <=#pageEnd# )tt where tt.rn > #pageStart#

select count(1) from dictlabandtest a inner join dicttestitem g on a.dicttestitemid=g.dicttestitemid where g.testtype <2 and a.dictlabid=#labid# and a.isactive=1 and (g.testname like '%$key$%' or g.fastcode like '%$key$%' or g.engname like '%$key$%')

select dgtest.dicttestitemid,dgtest.testcode,decode(dgtest.testtype,'2',dgtest.testname||'(公用套餐)',dgtest.testname) as testname,dgtest.testtype,nvl(dgtest.forsex,'B') as forsex from dictproductdetail dg inner join dicttestitem dgtest on (dgtest.active='1' and dg.productid=dgtest.dicttestitemid and (dgtest.testtype=2 or (dgtest.testtype=3 and dgtest.dictcustomerid=#value# ))) left join dicttestitem dgt on (dg.testgroupid=dgt.dicttestitemid and dgt.testtype=1) left join dicttestgroupdetail dp on dgt.dicttestitemid=dp.testgroupid left join dicttestitem dpttest on dp.dicttestitemid=dpttest.dicttestitemid left join dicttestitem dptgrouptest on (dg.testgroupid=dptgrouptest.dicttestitemid and dptgrouptest.testtype=0) group by dgtest.dicttestitemid,dgtest.testcode,dgtest.testname,dgtest.testtype,dgtest.forsex having count(dg.productid)=(count(dpttest.dicttestitemid)+count(dptgrouptest.dicttestitemid)) order by dgtest.testtype

SELECT DICTTESTITEMID AS Dicttestitemid,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,TESTCODE AS Testcode,ENGNAME AS Engname,ENGLONGNAME AS Englongname,TESTNAME AS Testname,PRECISION AS Precision,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,PRICE AS Price,BILLABLE AS Billable,ACTIVE AS Active,REPORT AS Report,TUBEGROUP AS Tubegroup,DICTCONTAINERID AS Dictcontainerid,DICTSPECIMENTYPEID AS Dictspecimentypeid,RESULTTYPE AS Resulttype,LIMITHIGH AS Limithigh,LIMITLOW AS Limitlow,FORSEX AS Forsex,REFMETHOD AS Refmethod,CLINICALREMARK AS Clinicalremark,OPERATIONREMARK AS Operationremark,DELTACHECK AS Deltacheck,DELTATYPE AS Deltatype,DEFAULTRESULT AS Defaultresult,UNIT AS Unit,REMARK AS Remark,TESTTYPE AS Testtype,DICTLABDEPTID AS Dictlabdeptid,UNIQUEID AS Uniqueid,DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,TESTRESULTTYPE AS Testresulttype,LABELNUMBER AS Labelnumber,DICTREPORTTEMPLATEID AS Dictreporttemplateid,NVL(ISNEEDEDORDER,'0') AS Isneededorder ,ISIMPORTANT AS Isimportant,DICTLOCUSID AS Dictlocusid,GENOTYPE AS Genotype,TESTALIAS AS Testalias,IMAGENEED AS Imageneed,RISKDENOMINATOR AS Riskdenominator,AVERAGERISK AS Averagerisk,MAXRISKMULTIPLE AS Maxriskmultiple,MINRISKMULTIPLE AS Minriskmultiple,ISONLYFORBILL AS Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT FROM DICTTESTITEM

SELECT Dicttestitemid, Fastcode, Testcode, Engname, Englongname, Testname, Precision, Displayorder, Price,Billable,Active,Report,Tubegroup,Dictcontainerid,Dictspecimentypeid,Resulttype,Limithigh,Limitlow,Forsex,Refmethod,Clinicalremark,Operationremark,Deltacheck,Deltatype,Defaultresult,Unit,Remark,Testtype,Dictlabdeptid,Uniqueid,Dictcustomerid,Testresulttype,Labelnumber,Dictreporttemplateid,Isneededorder,Isimportant,Dictlocusid,Genotype,Testalias,Imageneed,Riskdenominator,Averagerisk,Maxriskmultiple,Minriskmultiple,Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT FROM Dicttestitem where Dicttestitemid=#value#

SELECT * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (select Dicttestitemid, Fastcode, Testcode, Engname, Englongname, Testname, Precision, Displayorder, Price,Billable,Active,Report,Tubegroup,Dictcontainerid,Dictspecimentypeid,Resulttype,Limithigh,Limitlow,Forsex,Refmethod,Clinicalremark,Operationremark,Deltacheck,Deltatype,Defaultresult,Unit,Remark,Testtype,Dictlabdeptid,Uniqueid,Dictcustomerid,Testresulttype,Labelnumber,Dictreporttemplateid,Isneededorder,Isimportant,Dictlocusid,Genotype,Testalias,Imageneed,Riskdenominator,Averagerisk,Maxriskmultiple,Minriskmultiple,Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT from dicttestitem d where (d.testtype = ($testtype$)) and d.active=$IsActive$
Dictlabdeptid=$Dictlabdeptid$
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.Dicttestitemid desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$

SELECT Count(*) from dicttestitem d where (d.testtype = ($testtype$)) and d.active=$IsActive$
Dictlabdeptid=$Dictlabdeptid$
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.Dicttestitemid

SELECT * from dicttestitem d where (d.testtype = ($testtype$)) and d.active=$IsActive$
Dictlabdeptid=$Dictlabdeptid$
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.Dicttestitemid

SELECT * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (select Dicttestitemid, Fastcode, Testcode, Engname, Englongname, Testname, Precision, Displayorder, Price,Billable,Active,Report,Tubegroup,Dictcontainerid,Dictspecimentypeid,Resulttype,Limithigh,Limitlow,Forsex,Refmethod,Clinicalremark,Operationremark,Deltacheck,Deltatype,Defaultresult,Unit,Remark,Testtype,Dictlabdeptid,Uniqueid,Dictcustomerid,Testresulttype,Labelnumber,Dictreporttemplateid,Isneededorder,Isimportant,Dictlocusid,Genotype,Testalias,Imageneed,Riskdenominator,Averagerisk,Maxriskmultiple,Minriskmultiple,Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT from dicttestitem d where (d.testtype=0 or d.testtype=1) and d.active=1
d.dicttestitemid in (select h.dicttestitemid from Dictlabandtest h where h.dictlabid=$strdictlabid$ and h.isactive=1)
d.dicttestitemid not in ($strtestitemid$)
d.dicttestitemid not in (select p.testgroupid from dictproductdetail p where 1=1 and p.productid=$testitemid$ )
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.displayorder desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$

SELECT Count(*) FROM DICTTESTITEM d where (d.testtype=0 or d.testtype=1) and d.active=1
d.dicttestitemid in (select h.dicttestitemid from Dictlabandtest h where h.dictlabid=$strdictlabid$ and h.isactive=1)
d.dicttestitemid not in ($strtestitemid$)
d.dicttestitemid not in (select p.testgroupid from dictproductdetail p where 1=1 and p.productid=$testitemid$)
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')

SELECT * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (select Dicttestitemid, Fastcode, Testcode, Engname, Englongname, Testname, Precision, Displayorder, Price,Billable,Active,Report,Tubegroup,Dictcontainerid,Dictspecimentypeid,Resulttype,Limithigh,Limitlow,Forsex,Refmethod,Clinicalremark,Operationremark,Deltacheck,Deltatype,Defaultresult,Unit,Remark,Testtype,Dictlabdeptid,Uniqueid,Dictcustomerid,Testresulttype,Labelnumber,Dictreporttemplateid,Isneededorder,Isimportant,Dictlocusid,Genotype,Testalias,Imageneed,Riskdenominator,Averagerisk,Maxriskmultiple,Minriskmultiple,Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT from dicttestitem d where d.testtype=0 and d.Active='1'
d.dicttestitemid not in ($strtestitemid$)
d.dicttestitemid not in (select g.dicttestitemid from dicttestgroupdetail g where 1=1 and g.testgroupid=$testitemid$ )
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.displayorder desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$

select Count(*) from dicttestitem d where d.testtype=0 and d.Active='1'
d.dicttestitemid not in ($strtestitemid$)
d.dicttestitemid not in (select g.dicttestitemid from dicttestgroupdetail g where 1=1 and g.testgroupid=$testitemid$ )
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Uniqueid like '%$strKey$%')

SELECT * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (select Dicttestitemid, Fastcode, Testcode, Engname, Englongname, Testname, Precision, Displayorder, Price,Billable,Active,Report,Tubegroup,Dictcontainerid,Dictspecimentypeid,Resulttype,Limithigh,Limitlow,Forsex,Refmethod,Clinicalremark,Operationremark,Deltacheck,Deltatype,Defaultresult,Unit,Remark,Testtype,Dictlabdeptid,Uniqueid,Dictcustomerid,Testresulttype,Labelnumber,Dictreporttemplateid,Isneededorder,Isimportant,Dictlocusid,Genotype,Testalias,Imageneed,Riskdenominator,Averagerisk,Maxriskmultiple,Minriskmultiple,Isonlyforbill,ISPROJECT from dicttestitem d where 1=1 and d.active=$IsActive$
Dictcustomerid=$Dictcustomerid$
Testtype=$Testtype$
(d.testtype = '2' or d.testtype = '3' )
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Testcode like '%$strKey$%')
order by d.displayorder desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$

SELECT Count(*) from dicttestitem d where 1=1 and d.active=$IsActive$
Dictcustomerid=$Dictcustomerid$
Testtype=$Testtype$
(d.testtype = '2' or d.testtype = '3' )
( Testname like '%$strKey$%' or Testcode like '%$strKey$%')
SELECT DICTTESTITEMID,TESTCODE,TESTNAME,TESTTYPE,nvl(forsex,'B') FORSEX FROM dicttestitem WHERE ISPROJECT = '1'
